problems.title: Check Prime Number
problems.description:
You are given a positive integer N. A prime number is a number greater than 1 that has no positive divisors other than 1 and itself.

Your task is to check whether N is a prime number or not.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print "YES" (without quotes) if N is prime, otherwise print "NO".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
7

Sample Output
YES

Sample Input
10

Sample Output
NO
hintsList: A number n is prime if it is greater than 1 and has no divisor d with 2 <= d <= sqrt(n). Try checking divisibility up to sqrt(n).
